BriefDescription: Bus lock when a locked operations crosses a cache boundary or is done on an uncacheable memory type.
Counts the number of operations dispatched to the LS unit. Unit Masks ADDed. Load-op-Stores.
Counts the number of stores dispatched to the LS unit. Unit Masks ADDed.
Counts the number of loads dispatched to the LS unit. Unit Masks ADDed.
Number of STLF hits.

The number of accesses to the data cache for load and store references. This may include certain microcode scratchpad accesses, although these are generally rare. Each increment represents an eight-byte access, although the instruction may only be accessing a portion of that. This event is a speculative event.
LS MAB allocates by type - DC prefetcher.
LS MAB allocates by type - stores.
LS MAB allocates by type - loads.
L1 DTLB Miss or Reload off all sizes.
L1 DTLB Miss of a page of 1G size.
L1 DTLB Miss of a page of 2M size.
L1 DTLB Miss of a page of 32K size.
L1 DTLB Miss of a page of 4K size.
L1 DTLB Reload of a page of 1G size.
L1 DTLB Reload of a page of 2M size.
L1 DTLB Reload of a page of 32K size.
L1 DTLB Reload of a page of 4K size.
Total Page Table Walks on I-side.
Total Page Table Walks IC Type 1.
Total Page Table Walks IC Type 0.
Total Page Table Walks on D-side.
Total Page Table Walks DC Type 1.
Total Page Table Walks DC Type 0.
Misaligned loads.
Software Prefetch Instructions (PREFETCHNTA instruction) Dispatched.
Software Prefetch Instructions (3DNow PREFETCHW instruction) Dispatched.
Software Prefetch Instructions Dispatched. Prefetch, Prefetch_T0_T1_T2.
The number of software prefetches that did not fetch data outside of the processor core. Software PREFETCH instruction saw a match on an already-allocated miss request buffer.
The number of software prefetches that did not fetch data outside of the processor core. Software PREFETCH instruction saw a DC hit.
Cycles not in Halt.
